segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is disgusting, it's going everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, not even noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting all wet and slippery, it's really unpleasant to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing on that stool, and it's just adding to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, it looks dangerous and dirty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not even helping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one is doing anything about the water, it's just disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious, it's really frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a big mess, and it's really gross to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would clean up the water, it's just going everywhere and making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
